invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for CNI: Quality Assurance Report (fMRI)

___spike_thresh.descriptiion: z-score threshold for spike detector. DEFAULT=6.0

___nskip.descriptiion: number of initial time-points to skip. DEFAULT=6

gear.author: Robert F. Dougherty, Hua Wu
gear.description: Run QA metrics (displacement, signal spikes) to create a quality assurance report (png) for an fMRI NIfTI using CNI/NIMS code.
gear.label: CNI: Quality Assurance Report (fMRI)
gear.name: cni-qa-report-fmri

spike_thresh.descriptiion: z-score threshold for spike detector. DEFAULT=6.0

nskip.descriptiion: number of initial time-points to skip. DEFAULT=6
